title: The Traditional world of Islam: the inner life
creator_credit: Stephen Cross, Paul Keeler and Stephen Cross Ltd
brief_description: Explores the inner life, the mystical path within Islam known as Sufism and the role it has played with the civilization. This film is part of a series which examines various aspects of Islamic civilization. Suitable for upper primary and secondary levels.
